replies.msg:
COME ON YOU SPURS





熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會沒有主場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」


榮譽：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984
賽馬會傑志中心挑戰盃 冠軍：2017/2018
國際冠軍盃 冠軍：2018/2019

據瞭解，熱刺看上了列斯聯的18歲前鋒傑克-奇勒，這名年輕小將正在被眾多英超俱樂部追逐着，而熱刺也將他視為球隊未來的一員並希望能成功簽下他。本賽季，奇勒為列斯聯隊出場了15次，為球隊貢獻了2球2助攻。

但目前的問題是，列斯聯隊已經明確表示了他們不願在冬窗將奇勒出售，所以熱刺可能會為此與其簽訂某種協議。此前，水晶宮也向列斯聯隊提出了簽約奇勒的請求，但同樣遭到了球隊的拒絕，因為列斯聯隊希望奇勒能幫助球隊實現他們重返英超的願望。

”I think Daniel is going to listen to me, but you know sometimes I might have some crazy ideas. With our unbelievable fans, sometimes you need to be brave and take risks. I think the club is in a moment where they need to take risks.“

續約後

"I am honoured to have signed a new long-term contract as we approach one of the most significant periods in the club’s history, and be the manager that will lead this team into our new world-class stadium. This is just one of the factors that makes this one of the most exciting jobs in world football and we are already making plans to ensure we continue to build on the great work that everyone has contributed to over the past four years.

7月尾

“I’m happy preparing the team to arrive in the best condition for the first Premier League game.

“And of course, very happy with players who have signed new contracts like Harry Kane, Son, Lamela, Davinson and Michel Vorm – that’s like signing five new players.”

轉會窗完結個日

He continued, stating: ”What it means to be brave is to keep your best players, which is so important. For example, [to keep] Harry Kane - that is a massive effort by the club, and that is to be brave.“
